name: draftcoach
description: League of Legends champ select assistance app

scripts.dev:desktop: cd apps/desktop && npx concurrently "npx webpack serve --config webpack.config.js" "npx wait-on http://localhost:9000 && npx electron ."
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:desktop"
scripts.build:desktop: cd apps/desktop && npx webpack --mode production && npx electron-builder --win
scripts.postinstall: cd apps/backend && npm install && cd ../desktop && npm install
